mapper.insert: INSERT /* WaqDdlIdxColMapper.insertWAH */ INTO WAH_DDL_IDX_COL ( DDL_IDX_COL_ID , EXP_DTM , STR_DTM , ) SELECT A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

INSERT /* WaqDdlIdxColMapper.insertByRqstSno */ INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , DDL_IDX_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM , RQST_DCD , DDL_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , SORT_TYP , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , B.RQST_DTL_SNO , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_DTL_SNO) FROM WAQ_DDL_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.DDL_IDX_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , C.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , B.DDL_IDX_ID , B.DDL_IDX_PNM , B.RQST_DCD , C.DDL_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , C.SORT_TYP , C.OBJ_DESCN , C.OBJ_VERS , C.FRS_RQST_DTM , C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAQ_DDL_TBL A INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL C ON C.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}

INSERT /* WaqDdlIdxColMapper.insertByRqstSnoTsf2 */ INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , RQST_DCD , DDL_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , SORT_TYP , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, STND_ASRT ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_DTL_SNO) FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_DTL_SNO , D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , D.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , A.RQST_DCD , D.DDL_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , D.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , D.SORT_TYP , D.OBJ_DESCN , D.OBJ_VERS , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , NOW() , A.RQST_USER_ID ,D.STND_ASRT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAQ_DDL_IDX A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON A.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND A.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DDL_IDX_PNM = C.DDL_IDX_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL D ON D.STND_ASRT = C.STND_ASRT AND D.DDL_IDX_ID = C.DDL_IDX_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}

INSERT /* WaqDdlIdxColMapper.insertByRqstSnoTsf */ INTO WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , RQST_DCD , DDL_COL_ID , DDL_IDX_PNM , DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , SORT_TYP , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , E.RQST_DTL_SNO , IFNULL((SELECT MAX(X.RQST_DTL_SNO) FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = E.RQST_DTL_SNO ), 0) + @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RQST_DTL_SNO , D.DDL_IDX_COL_PNM , D.DDL_IDX_COL_LNM , A.RQST_DCD , D.DDL_COL_ID , C.DDL_IDX_PNM , D.DDL_IDX_COL_ORD , D.SORT_TYP , D.OBJ_DESCN , D.OBJ_VERS , C.FRS_RQST_DTM , C.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , NOW() , A.RQST_USER_ID FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP, WAQ_DDL_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DB_SCH_ID = A.SRC_DB_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.DDL_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX C ON C.DDL_TBL_ID = B.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_IDX_COL D ON D.DDL_IDX_ID = C.DDL_IDX_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_IDX E ON E.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND E.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND E.DDL_IDX_PNM = C.DDL_IDX_PNM WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
